mapper.select: SELECT UB.POST_NO, UB.TITLE, UB.VIEW_CNT, UI.USER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(UB.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM USER_INFO UI, USER_BOARD UB WHERE UI.USER_NO = UB.USER_NO ORDER BY UB.POST_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_BOARD SET VIEW_CNT =VIEW_CNT+1 -- int(11) WHERE POST_NO = #{post_no} -- int(11)
mapper.select: SELECT UB.POST_NO, UB.TITLE, UB.CONTENTS, UB.VIEW_CNT, UI.EMAIL, UI.USER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(UB.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM USER_INFO UI, USER_BOARD UB WHERE UI.USER_NO = UB.USER_NO AND UB.POST_NO = #{post_no};
mapper.update: update user_board SET TITLE = #{title} -- varchar(300) ,CONTENTS = #{contents} -- varchar(4000) ,CHG_USER_NO = 0 -- int(11) ,CHG_DT = NOW() WHERE POST_NO = #{post_no} -- int(11)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_BOARD WHERE POST_NO IN #{post_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USER_INFO U, USER_BOARD B WHERE U.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND U.EMAIL = #{email}
